species.name: nosepass
descriptions: If two of these meet, they cannot get too close because their noses repel each other.
It hunts without twitching a muscle by pulling in its prey with powerful magnetism. But sometimes it pulls natural enemies in close.
It moves less than an inch a year, but when it’s in a jam, it will spin and drill down into the ground in a split second.
Its body emits a powerful magnetism. It feeds on prey that is pulled in by the force. Its magnetism is stronger in cold seasons.
Its magnetic nose always faces north and draws iron objects to its body to protect itself better.

abilities.name: sturdy
abilities.effect: Prevents being KOed from full HP, leaving 1 HP instead.  Protects against the one-hit KO moves regardless of HP.

abilities.name: magnet-pull
abilities.effect: Prevents steel opponents from fleeing or switching out.

abilities.name: sand-force
abilities.effect: Strengthens rock, ground, and steel moves to 1.3× their power during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.
